sentence:
• The Procter & Gamble Company's PG shares gained 0.9% after the company reported fourth-quarter fiscal 2018 earnings of $0.94 per share, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.90 per share
• Shares of Archer-Daniels-Midland Company ADM jumped 1.9% after the company reported second-quarter fiscal 2018 earnings of $1.02 per share, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.78 per share
• KLA-Tencor Corporation's KLAC shares surged 10.5% after the company reported fourth-quarter fiscal 2018 earnings of $2.22 per share, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $2.14 per share
• Shares of AK Steel Holding Corporation AKS declined 13.6% after the company reported second-quarter fiscal 2018 adjusted earnings of $0.22 per share, missing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.23 per share
